CustomField.description:
References the event from which the Moment was created. This is typically an automatically inserted value listing the flow that created the Moment.
In System Use: Campaign Member: After Save Automations; 'Case - Handoff Button'; 'Contact - After Save Automations'; 'Koala Intent Signal - After Save Automations'; 'Retool User - After Save Automations'; 'Task - After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: Koala
CustomField.inlineHelpText: References the event from which the Moment was created. This is typically an automatically inserted value listing the flow that created the Moment.
CustomField.label: Created From Detail
